cards.title: Projectile Modelling and Equations of Motion
details: Model projectile motion as a particle with constant acceleration
Use horizontal and vertical equations of motion to solve for velocity, range, and maximum height
Derive and use the Cartesian equation of a projectile's trajectory

cards.title: Moments and Centres of Mass
details: Calculate moments of forces about a point for coplanar forces
Find the centre of mass using symmetry or composite bodies

cards.title: Conditions and Solutions for Equilibrium
details: Apply equilibrium conditions for coplanar forces
Solve problems involving equilibrium, including toppling or sliding

cards.title: Angular Speed and Acceleration
details: Understand and use the relation v = rω
Use formulas for centripetal acceleration (rω^2 or v^2/r)

cards.title: Horizontal and Vertical Circular Motion
details: Solve problems for particles in horizontal and vertical circles
Find forces, conditions for complete motion, and positions where forces vanish

cards.title: Elastic Strings and Springs
details: Apply Hooke’s law relating force to extension or compression
Use the formula for elastic potential energy

cards.title: Energy Methods and Mixed Problems
details: Solve problems involving forces, energy, and work with springs and strings

9231_Paper_3_Further_Mechanics.topic: Linear Motion under a Variable Force

cards.title: Variable Force Modelling
details: Model linear motion under a variable force by setting up and solving appropriate differential equations

cards.title: Collisions and Restitution
details: Recall Newton’s experimental law and coefficient of restitution
Use conservation of momentum and restitution to solve impact problems
